author: Tony Tobin
method: Place the chilli, peanut butter, water, soy sauce, sesame oil and seeds into a food processor and blend until smooth. Thread the chicken chunks onto two wooden skewers and drizzle with the oil. To serve, place the satay sauce into a small bowl. Place the chicken skewers onto a plate with the sauce alongside.
ingredients: ½ red chilli, finely chopped,  2 tbsp crunchy peanut butter,  splash water,  2 tsp soy sauce,  ½ tsp toasted sesame oil,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  ½ ready-cooked chicken breast, cut into chunks,  drizzle of olive oil, to serve
